# Signal&lt;TSender,TSignalArgs&gt;.Wrap method

Wraps an existing GSignal.

```csharp
public static Signal Wrap(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | The name of the GSignal to wrap. |

## Return Value

An instance of [`Signal`](../Signal.md) which describes the signal to wrap.
